name: Outbake Demo Alpha 1.0
description:
Outbake is a top down shooter game set in a world where a mysterious virus has turned victims into killer muffin zombies!! In arcade mode attempt to survive for as long as possible and get the highest score possible. With 8 maps currently available with more on the way. Face off against various enemies across different difficulties for a challenge that suits you.

We're currently looking for feedback in order to improve the game so please visit our reddit page r/outbakegame and let us know what you think.
